known_issues: App shows only a black screen; user unable to view any content after deployment.

existing_features.title: Diagnose and fix the root cause of the deployed app rendering a black screen so that the initial UI reliably renders (at minimum: the unauthenticated login screen from AuthGate).

Add a top-level runtime error boundary and a user-facing fallback screen that appears if any render-time error occurs, showing an English error message and a 'Reload' action, and logging the underlying error details to the browser console.

Ensure the frontend config module required by the auth/actor hooks (imported as '../config') is present and cannot crash the app at runtime: it must provide safe defaults and handle missing/invalid environment/config values gracefully (e.g., Internet Identity URL, derivation origin, canister/agent config).

Add an explicit, visible loading state for app initialization phases that can otherwise appear blank (e.g., while InternetIdentityProvider initializes and while the caller profile query is waiting on actor availability).

projectName: Fix black screen on app load and add safe runtime fallback UI
